Package com.myjavatools.lib

The package contains utility tools that help solve ubiquitous problems while doing Java programming.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BigMap Title: My Java Tools Library.
Files.BufferingFilter Description: Buffering filter stores some data, and these data can be later retrieved.
Files.ByteFilter Description: The interface is used to define filters for filtering data in pipes.

ZipInput Title: MyJavaTools: ZippedInput
 

Package com.myjavatools.lib Description

The package contains utility tools that help solve ubiquitous problems while doing Java programming. This is version 1.4, for JDK 1.4. Some tools remain from version 1.3.1 and ought to be obsoleted.
